entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:19 p.m. PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 8:00 PM MST Monday 10 April 2023
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level lowering to 1500 metres near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to 1000 metres in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
